datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to the impressionist movement, Monet, Renoir, and landscape paintings.

columns.name: period_of_impressionism
columns.description: Categorizes the period of the impressionist movement when the painting was created

columns.name: is_temporary_exhibition
columns.description: Indicates if the painting is on temporary exhibition.

columns.name: scene_setting
columns.description: Whether the painting depicts an indoor or outdoor scene

columns.name: artist_notoriety
columns.description: A numerical value representing the overall fame and recognition of the artist

columns.name: contains_landscape
columns.description: Indicates whether the painting features a landscape

columns.name: has_signature
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the painting is signed by the artist

columns.name: urbanization_level
columns.description: Assessed urbanization level of the depicted location, ranging from rural to urban

columns.name: volcanic_activity
columns.description: Level of volcanic activity during the year of painting

columns.name: modern_elements_count
columns.description: Number of modern elements such as buildings, vehicles, and roads identified in the painting

columns.name: active_in_paris
columns.description: Binary flag indicating whether the artist was primarily active in Paris during the Impressionist period.

columns.name: part_of_series
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if the painting is part of a recognized series.

columns.name: average_sale_price
columns.description: The average sale price of the artist's paintings in thousands of dollars.

columns.name: year_created
columns.description: Year the painting was created

columns.name: count_natural_elements
columns.description: Number of recognizably natural elements such as trees, water, or flowers depicted in the painting

columns.name: is_international
columns.description: Indicates if the painting is sourced from an international location.

columns.name: season_created
columns.description: The season in which the painting was created

columns.name: style_popularity_index
columns.description: A numerical index representing the popularity of the impressionist art style

columns.name: landscape_elements_count
columns.description: Number of landscape elements such as trees, water bodies, and fields identified in the painting

columns.name: associated_art_movements_count
columns.description: The count of major art movements that the artist was a part of.

columns.name: diversity_of_works
columns.description: A measure from 0 to 1 representing the diversity of types of paintings the artist has produced, calculated as the ratio of unique painting types to total works.

columns.name: painting_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each painting

columns.name: brush_stroke_type
columns.description: Categorical descriptor of the brush stroke type used predominantly in the painting (fine, broad, dabbed, etc.).

columns.name: artist_period
columns.description: Categorical label of the artistic period the artist was most active in

columns.name: critics_positive_reviews
columns.description: Number of positive reviews received from critics

columns.name: awards_count
columns.description: Number of prestigious art awards received by the artist.

columns.name: exhibition_frequency
columns.description: Number of times the painting has been exhibited in the last decade

columns.name: artist_popularity
columns.description: Popularity level of the artist on a scale from 1 to 10

columns.name: artworks_sold
columns.description: Number of artworks sold during the artist's lifetime.

columns.name: tourist_season
columns.description: Represents whether the count was done during the high tourist season.

columns.name: painting_year_estimation
columns.description: Estimated year in which the painting was created

columns.name: spring_exhibition_day
columns.description: Day of the year when painting was first exhibited in spring

columns.name: time_period
columns.description: The period when the painting was created, categorized as before or after 1890

columns.name: technique_popularity
columns.description: Popularity of the painting technique during the era measured on a scale

columns.name: artist_influence_score
columns.description: Score from 0 to 10, reflecting the overall impact and recognition of the artist at the time the painting was created

columns.name: year_of_creation
columns.description: The year the painting was created.

columns.name: number_of_visitors
columns.description: Number of visitors to the gallery where the painting is displayed per year

columns.name: frame_material
columns.description: Material of the painting's frame

columns.name: non_prestigious_gallery_displays
columns.description: Count of how many times the painting has been displayed in non-prestigious galleries

columns.name: painting_age
columns.description: Age of the painting calculated from the current year minus the year the painting was created.

columns.name: artist_prolificacy_score
columns.description: A score based on the number of paintings an artist produced during the Impressionist period, higher scores indicate higher prolificacy

columns.name: industrial_elements_presence
columns.description: Presence of industrial elements such as factories and smokestacks in the painting

columns.name: artist_popularity_percentile
columns.description: The percentile ranking of the artist's popularity based on contemporary records

columns.name: is_landscape
columns.description: Indicates if the painting belongs to the landscape category

columns.name: gallery_visibility_score
columns.description: A score representing how visible the painting is in public galleries, higher values indicate higher visibility

columns.name: historical_importance
columns.description: An index of the painting's historical importance

columns.name: painting_style
columns.description: Artistic style of the painting

columns.name: number_of_exhibitions
columns.description: The total number of exhibitions featuring the artist's paintings.

columns.name: light_source
columns.description: Type of light source used in the painting, either natural or artificial

columns.name: artist_name
columns.description: Name of the artist

columns.name: brush_stroke_detail_level
columns.description: Score representing the level of detail in the brush strokes, higher scores indicate more detailed brushwork.

columns.name: elevation
columns.description: Elevation of the location where the painting was created in meters

columns.name: symposium_exposures
columns.description: Number of times the artist's works have been exposed at major art symposiums

columns.name: exhibitions_count
columns.description: Total number of exhibitions where the artist's works have been shown.

queries.question: Is there a relationship between the unique identifier of a painting and the presence of landscape in the artwork?
queries.true_hypothesis: The value of a painting's unique identifier (painting_id) is determined by a complex formula involving the artist's popularity, presence of landscape, critics' positive reviews, historical importance, and the painting's category.
